title: OnePlus Nord CE 2 Lite officially launched alongside the affordable Nord Buds
content:
Today, OnePlus officially unveiled the OnePlus Nord CE 2 Lite and OnePlus Nord Buds alongside the OnePlus 10R. The OnePlus Nord CE 2 Lite is a cheaper version of the Nord CE 2 that arrived in February. Meanwhile, the OnePlus Nord Buds see OnePlus expanding the Nord brand, which has so far been restricted to

The post OnePlus Nord CE 2 Lite officially launched alongside the affordable Nord Buds appeared first on XDA.
description: OnePlus officially unveiled the OnePlus Nord CE 2 Lite and OnePlus Nord Buds alongside the OnePlus 10R. Read on.
